Actions.Name: Delete rows from a table based on a condition
Actions.Description: Delete zero or more rows from a table providing a WHERE condition

Actions.Name: Execute a statement on the Exasol database
Actions.Description: Execute a statement without a result set

Actions.Name: Query the Exasol database
Actions.Description: Provide a query and get a result set

Actions.Name: Get rows from a table based on a condition
Actions.Description: Get zero or more rows from a table providing a WHERE condition

Actions.Name: Get tables that are available for the user
Actions.Description: Get a list of all available tables

Actions.Name: Insert row to a table
Actions.Description: Insert a single row into an Exasol table

Actions.Name: Update rows in a table based on a condition
Actions.Description: Update zero or more row in a table based on a condition
